name: libs/map-builder/index.js
MapBuilder
description: Class for encapsulating a map building operation.

name: onError
description: Specify an error callback for this {@link MapBuilder}.

name: onSuccess
description: Specify a success callback for this {@link MapBuilder}.

params.name: ok_cb
params.description: the success callback, passed the generated SVG as a string.

name: spec
description:
Specify the configuration to use.

May be used in conjunction with {@link specFile}.  They will be merged with the
spec_obj taking precedence in case of clashes.

params.name: spec_obj
params.description: object describing the configuration to use.

name: specFile
description:
Specify the configuration to use.

May be used in conjunction with {@link spec}.  They will be merged with the
spec_obj taking precedence in case of clashes.

name: force
description:
Specify whether to force a rebuild.

Normally maps are cached based on the specification, but if you update
this module you may want to use this option to force the map to be
re-created.

name: build_map
description:
Asynchronously build the map.

Requires {@link onError} and {@link onSuccess} specified to handle the
results.

name: get_shape_info
description: Get info from the shape file.

name: libs/projections/index.js
libs/utils/index.js
